action.description: The action which might be executed.
action.markdownDescription: The action which might be executed.

chance.description: The chance that the action will execute, from 0 to 1. (E.g. 0.1 means 10% chance, 0.95 means 95% chance).
chance.markdownDescription: The chance that the action will execute, from 0 to 1. (E.g. 0.1 means 10% chance, 0.95 means 95% chance).

fail_action.description: The action to execute if the specified action in the `action` field is not executed.
fail_action.markdownDescription: The action to execute if the specified action in the `action` field is not executed.

type.description:
## Chance

---


[Meta Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/meta_action_types/chance)

Executes the provided action only with a specific chance.

Type ID: `origins:chance`

---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:chance",
    "action": {
        "type": "origins:set_on_fire",
        "duration": 5
    },
    "chance": 0.4
}
```

This example has a 40% chance to set the entity on fire for 5 seconds.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Chance (Meta Action Type) date: 2021-04-07

Chance

Meta Action Type

Executes the provided action only with a specific chance.

Type ID: origins:chance

Fields

Field Type Default Description
action Action Type The action which might be executed.
chance Float The chance that the action will execute, from 0 to 1. (E.g. 0.1 means 10% chance, 0.95 means 95% chance).
fail_action Action Type optional The action to execute if the specified action in the action field is not executed.

Examples

"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:chance",
    "action": {
        "type": "origins:set_on_fire",
        "duration": 5
    },
    "chance": 0.4
}

This example has a 40% chance to set the entity on fire for 5 seconds.
